translation: He was a man of high antiquity and frugality who didn't care about laughing and talking.
When he was about to enter into the final phase of his illness, he asked his attendants.
"Who will build a seamless stūpa with me?
The attendant said.
"Please ask the master to model the stūpa.
The master said.
'I couldn't draw it with all my might.'
He then happily departed.

source_sentence: 闍維弟子收舍利并遺骨。
translation: The Śāriputra's disciples collected the relics and bones.
He was buried to the left of the pagoda at Tiantong Ying'an.
He was 84 years old.
He had a life span of 84 years and a preserved age of 68 years.

source_sentence: 紹其傳者有橫川珙石林鞏。
translation: His biographer was Hengchuan Kōshilin Kō.
He called it the Second Ambrosia Gate.

source_sentence: 續傳燈錄卷第三十六(終)
translation: Xu Zendenglu, vol. 36 (end)
